item.title: On Hiking to Bibémus
item.description: The path that leads to the Carrières de Bibémus starts just past the Lycée Paul Cézanne. It’s a multi-use road all the way to the plateau, so pietons have to be wary of Citroëns careering around corners and braking at the worst moments — if indeed the goal is to keep the vehicles fastened to the earth.
